summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Veteran’s Affairs Commission will convene on Thursday, November 14, 2024, at 12:00 p.m. in the Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room, with a videoconference option available. The meeting aims to address matters concerning veterans' affairs, including updates on proposals and recognitions.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order, Pledge of Allegiance, and Roll Call  
2. Public Comments on agenda items III – VI  
3. Approval of the October 10, 2024, meeting minutes  
4. Presentation by the Military Order of the World Wars  
5. Update on the Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment RFP  
6. Follow-up on Dr. Katina Robertson’s Special Recognition  
7. Fiscal Year 2023/2024 Annual Report update  
8. Announcements and Adjournment  

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a presentation from the Military Order of the World Wars, highlighting their contributions. An update on the Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment RFP will provide insights into the ongoing efforts to assess veterans' needs. Additionally, there will be a follow-up regarding the special recognition of Dr. Katina Robertson.

**Action Items**:  
The Commission will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss the updates provided on the RFP and special recognition, potentially leading to further actions based on the information presented. Public comments will also be taken into consideration for future decisions.
